meanings.sent1: The bird sang a melodious song in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The melodious notes of the piano filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The melodious sound of the wind chimes made the garden feel magical.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as melodious as a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The melodious voice of the singer captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: Having a pleasant melody or tune
meanings.sent1: The melodious lullaby put the baby to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The melodious rhythm of the drums got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent3: The melodious sound of the ice cream truck made everyone run outside.
meanings.sent4: The melodious flow of the river was calming to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The melodious whistle of the kettle signaled that the tea was ready.
